name: Brave Chicken
description:
Trailer

Made for Global GameJam 2022
https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/...

Chicken wants to prove her bravery, so she faces untold dangers along her ascent of Tall Mountain, by overcoming enemies, and collecting an arsenal of trophies to bring back to the farm and show the animals that she may be a chicken, but she’s not “chicken”.
